page.title: 18LEISURE IN THE WHICKHAM AREA
page.content: There are many things to do in your spare time around Whickham. The {Watergate Community Centre}has a private{tennis club }with several courts.There are lessons in ballet,tap stage and disco dancing available almost every night of the week at various locations.There are{riding {stables }for those interested in horses.Chase Park is a centre for other activities with tennis courts swings ,a slide,paddling pool and climbing frame. The older people have a{bowling green }and a crazy golf course can be used by people of all ages.The{annual fayre }is held here. There is a B.M.X.course at Whickham Thorns and a swimming pool in Dunston both of these activities are more popular in the summer months.
